Uses of Class
picard.fingerprint.HaplotypeProbabilities

  • Packages that use HaplotypeProbabilities 
    Package Description
    picard.fingerprint  

    • Uses of HaplotypeProbabilities in picard.fingerprint

      Subclasses of HaplotypeProbabilities in picard.fingerprint 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HaplotypeProbabilitiesFromContaminatorSequence
      Represents the probability of the underlying haplotype of the contaminating sample given the data.
      class  HaplotypeProbabilitiesFromGenotype
      Represents a set of HaplotypeProbabilities that were derived from a single SNP genotype at a point in time.
      class  HaplotypeProbabilitiesFromGenotypeLikelihoods
      Represents the likelihood of the HaplotypeBlock given the GenotypeLikelihoods (GL field from a VCF, which is actually a log10-likelihood) for each of the SNPs in that block.
      class  HaplotypeProbabilitiesFromSequence
      Represents the probability of the underlying haplotype given the data.
      class  HaplotypeProbabilityOfNormalGivenTumor
      A wrapper class for any HaplotypeProbabilities instance that will assume that the given evidence is that of a tumor sample and provide an hp for the normal sample that tumor came from.
      Methods in picard.fingerprint with parameters of type HaplotypeProbabilities 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Fingerprint.add(HaplotypeProbabilities h) 
      abstract void HaplotypeProbabilities.merge(HaplotypeProbabilities other)
      Merges in the likelihood information from the supplied haplotype probabilities object.
      void HaplotypeProbabilitiesFromContaminatorSequence.merge(HaplotypeProbabilities other) 
      void HaplotypeProbabilitiesFromGenotype.merge(HaplotypeProbabilities other) 
      void HaplotypeProbabilitiesFromSequence.merge(HaplotypeProbabilities other)
      Merges information from another haplotype probabilities object for the same haplotype into this object.
      void HaplotypeProbabilityOfNormalGivenTumor.merge(HaplotypeProbabilities ignored) 
      double HaplotypeProbabilities.shiftedLogEvidenceProbabilityGivenOtherEvidence(HaplotypeProbabilities otherHp)
      returns the log-probability the evidence, using as priors the posteriors of another object
      Constructors in picard.fingerprint with parameters of type HaplotypeProbabilities 
      Constructor and Description
      HaplotypeProbabilityOfNormalGivenTumor(HaplotypeProbabilities hpOfTumor, double pLoH)
